tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionPatterns (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  energy_consumed FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES SmartDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PowerOptimization (
  optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  optimization_date DATE,
  optimization_result VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES SmartDevices(device_id)
);
